resources.string: DnDeck is an adaptation of the DnD game in a mobile card game.

Your character has six abilities :
 STR is your strength, used to hit and damage enemies with melee weapons 
 DEX is your dexterity, used to hit and damage enemies with ranged weapons 
 CON is your constitution, used to determine how much health you have 
 INT is your intelligence, used by some classes to cast spells 
 WIS is your wisdom, seldom used in this early version 
 CHA is your charisma, used by other classes to cast spells.

When creating a character, your race will give you some ability bonuses, while your class will determine what weapons and spells you will have access to, as well as determining your hit die, used when levelling up to gain bonus health.

Once your character is created, the combat commences. The four weapons and spells you will have chosen are assigned to a card suit. Playing a card of a given suit will use the corresponding spell or weapon to try and damage the enemy. The bigger the value of the card, the more damage it will deal.

Each turn, you and your enemy will draw cards in your or their deck, until both of you have six cards in hand. Then, you will simultaneously choose up to three cards to play. Once you have chosen, hit the "End turn" button. It will play all the chosen cards, starting with your first one, then the enemy\'s first one, and so on.

If you hit 0HP against an enemy, you have a chance to survive and continue playing. This chance decreases as you die, until you level up, where it is reset. If you die though, your save will be deleted.

When levelling up, you can choose one card among four to add to your deck. You can also choose to disable some cards if you deem them not useful. But you must have a minimum of twelve enabled cards at all times.
You must distribute every result only once !
Increase one or two abilities (to a max of 20)
